name: Listened to 2023 Expectations: ACC Championship or bust?

content.html:
Howard Schnellenberger went from 5-6 to 9-3 in his second season. Can we expect a similar jump from Mario Cristobal in Year 2? Carlos Ledo of the MIA All-Day podcast joins Manny Navarro of The Athletic to discuss 2023 expectations, Miami’s showing in the NFL draft, an important weekend for transfer targets and answer mailbag questions. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

By Wide Right: A show about the Miami Hurricanes
